title: Tasty Pallipalayam Chicken Roast Recipe
content:
Such a fast and easy chicken recipe which taste so delicious. You can serve this with plain rice or rasam rice. It tastes fantastic.

Really spicy and lip-smackingly delicious chicken masala roast. This taste so yummy with either roti, paratha or chapati.

This is a chicken roast recipe that is so good. This recipe is spicy and kind of addictive. You will love it for sure. If you want to add some lemon juice to increase the taste.

 

Pallipalayam Chicken Roast Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 30 mins

Total time: 40 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 2 to 3 servings

 

Ingredients

Chicken - 500 grams

Salt to taste

Turmeric Powder - 1 teaspoon

Dry Red Chillies - 4 to 5

Curry leaves - 2 sprig

Coconut Oil - 3 tablespoons

 

FOR GRINDING:

Onion - 2 large chopped

Garlic - 12 cloves

Curry leaves a handful

Green Chillies - 3

 

Instructions

Grind the ingredients given to a coarse mixture.

Heat oil and fry curry leaves and dry red chillies.

Add in the ground masala and saute for 3 mins.

Add chicken, salt and turmeric and mix well.

Cover and cook on low heat for 25 to 30 mins keep mixing in between.

Now let the chicken roast on high heat till it well coloured.

Remove and serve it.
